Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: We needed a place to stay the night before our flight from Barcelona and found this ETAP to be located close to the airport, clean and a great value. Even though we were close to the airport there was not airplane noise. It is located right next door to a McDonald's which worked out well for our evening meal. The breakfast was inexpensive but done well. I will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money in a budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: wam111
Reviews.Content: Let's be fair, this is a very cheap budget hotel but it provides very good value if you keep that in mind. The room, indeed the whole premises, were very neat and clean. As you would (or should) expect, facilities and the room are very basic but adequate for this price range (39 euros for a night + 4 euros for continental breakfast + 5 euros for 24 hour wifi). The room has a TV with the usual one or two English channels most foreign hotels seem to have (CNN in this case). Breakfast was again good value for the cheap price and 5 euros for 24 hours of wifi is not bad value even if more and more hotels are offering it for free these days (many still don't though).

Reviews.Title: “layover haven”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: this was a great place to relax during a long layover (8hr). located close to airport with a very quick cab ride of 20 euros. located on a wide commercial street with banks, food, shops, etc... the hotel shares lot with a sister brand "ibis" which is an upgraded version of "etap"

Reviews.Title: “pleasent economical stay”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Staff was polite. Rooms were clean. Location was a little out of way if you want to stay in the City of Barcelona. One can travel to Barcelona by bus, leaving from outside the hotel it is worth it. Costs about Euro 3.00 for return trip. Breakfast was poor though cost was reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Good for one night, neither more nor less”
Reviews.Author: Veraki
Reviews.Content: We stayed for one night. It is a classic small etap room. The carpet was dirty, the furniture was old and the TV did not work. The bathroom also was not clean. The hotel ages and need renovation. It is a good choise if you want to be near the airport and not spent money. I would not recommend it for more than one night.

Reviews.Title: “Needs a change of furniture”
Reviews.Author: asr_riise
Reviews.Content: I stayed in etap for three days. The room had nothing to do with what it looked like in the pictures ( setting, colours) . All the furniture was old, the curtain would not work, the shower neither . The pavement was dirty and the whole room had a strong smell. The noise from the doors in the corridor and other rooms could constantly be heard.

Reviews.Title: “Good Clean Budget Stay”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The place was a 20 euro cab ride from the airport and is great if you want to be near it. It is clean, basic, simple, but comfortable. Looked more like a new college dorm room but it was comfy. Shopping center and restaurants nearby. For the price, you should not be complaining about anything.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, good rooms”
Reviews.Author: Mariliava
Reviews.Content: I stayed 2 nights alone. Very clen, but there was a litle smell of smoking area. Be sure to ask a non smoking when you get there. It is not very near to Barcelona. there is a bus (bus 31) that takes almost 1 hour from Barcelona center to the front of the hotel (easy to get there). There a McDonalds just beside the hotel. If you need internet you can try to use the computer from the ibis rigth beside etap

Reviews.Title: “It's another E-tap”
Reviews.Author: Paul D Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Good E-tap, not the most modern version, but still very good considering its a one star hotel. Not very close to town, but the buses stop very near by for a half hour ride into town. Its safer parking on the street, as the public car park they advise you to use is littered with rubbish and is not very well lit. As a bonus, if you get one of the rooms that face Mac Donalds, you can hook onto their Wifi for free instead of buying the 24 hour E-tap connection.

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE, DIRTY”
Reviews.Author: weronidlo
Reviews.Content: The room was clearly not cleaned before our arrival. only sheets and towels were relatively fresh. The floor was spattered with crumbles and the shower had sand in it. oh, and the intense marihuana smell in the room... it's one of the worst hotel experiences ever! if you have a bit more money, choose the nearby ibis hotel. only good thing about the etap hotel is free internet from the nearby mcdonalds.

Reviews.Title: “Value for Money!!”
Reviews.Author: tapen4
Reviews.Content: Rooms are spacious and clean, Hotel is new or recently renovated...I liked this hotel as such , only glitch is the location of the property, Villadeccans is very close to Airport but far away from City center. Mc-Donalds is next door but everything else seems very far. It appears it is in the middle of industrial area. Beds are comfortable but I think Hotel is little overpriced (Almost 55 E) if I see Location and transport. To get to City you have to take a Bus to Espanaya , bus station is 60 meters away from Hotel's reception. All Guys at reception carry some kind of attitude which sounds like Etap proprietery......They always keep on saying.."This is ETAP....what are you expecting" Hotel is not suitable if you are in BCN for more than 1 day and willing to see nightlife etc...it is better to take good hostal in city. I think I spend all that money on transport which I saved on Etap stay at villadeccans

Reviews.Title: “Good for Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: cmdom
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights during a road trip. It's half an hour from Barcelona centre (1 bus ans the stop is just in the front of the hotel). We are close to the centre, but in a calm area, with no noise and no parking problems. Theres a McDon just outside the hotel. Clean and basic. Lift. No breakfast in the lowest tarif. Good for value. Recomend.

Reviews.Title: “Viladecans”
Reviews.Author: kal-steph
Reviews.Content: Stayed at etap Hotel for the 1st time after being advised to stay there as its cheap by some friends. its quite far from Reus airport about 1-1/2 hours by the coach, which you can pick up outside the arrivals building, its costs only 12 euros single to Sants Estacio, from here we went into the station and got the train to viladecans station which was around 7 euros for two people , the train to viladecans was about 25-30 mins. You'll find information stands in the station, so you can ask for help but unless your good with your spanish then you will need to be patient as english is spoken very little we found. Once you get to viladecans station we found the bus stop just outside which takes you to the bus stop by the hotel, advise the driver of the exact address, its a 5 min bus journey. On arriving at the check in desk we needed to show our passports which were scanned to be given to the police, you will need to sign the two copies of paper, your given your passports back. The room was very basic with big bed which sleeps another on the top bunk bed. rooms come with a shower and sink and toilet.. all worked fine. Tv didnt work but that wasnt a problem. You may want to take a towel as our cleaners didnt change them , they will come in and tidy the bed but thats it... maybe worth just doing your own bed and not having the hassle of someone in your room when your out. All in all its worth the money you pay. Right out side the hotel there is a bus stop, with buses to barcelona espanya staion every 15 mins at only 1.30 euros it takes 30 mins so its qucik and very very cheap. you can also on the return journey get the L81 Bus back to viladecans and that pretty much stops back at the Hotel.(night buses run every 20 mins to and from barcelona get the L14 or L16 Night bus) The metro and buses are much better then london, alot more frequent and all air conditioned. Very tourist friendly and expalining the journey route on all bus stops. Get a T10 card in the metro its 6 erous and you get to travel to any metro stop upto 10 times. a single to any metro costs 1.30 euros. Dont bother getting the Hotel breakfast its nasty and not very clean... save the money and wait till 12pm as the Mcdonalds which is next door to the hotel serves better food :) Hope the review helps.

Reviews.Title: “Etap - Basic & Inexpensive but out of the way”
Reviews.Author: MaryK7
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Etap Barcelona (in the industrial suburb of Viladecans) in early May for two nights. We arrived at the hotel late at night after a late flight to find they had lost our booking and we were very lucky they had a room at all. The staff member refused to look at my printed booking confirmation - consequently I was charged twice for the same room (I discovered this later on my credit card statement). I think language difficulties were the reason for this - we didn't speak Spanish and he spoke limited English (and didn't read English). The room though was very comfortable for the price, but basic. Very clean. You get a bunk bed type arrangement with a double bed below and a single bed on top. The ensuite bathroom is basic but new and clean. The hotel was evidently only completed very recently. There is also a TV in the room. Breakfast is an extra 9 euros from memory and is not worth it - croissants or bread with jam, coffee and juice only. Go next door to McDonalds and you'll get a hot breakfast for the same price. There are restaurants a two minute walk up the road and the bus stops almost right outside the hotel - it drops you off at Plaza Espanya in the Centre of Barcelona. The bus takes about 15-20 minutes. The train does not stop near to the hotel and the nearest station is a 20 minute walk from the information provided by them. I strongly suggest you write down the instructions for getting the bus yourself from the hotel info in the lobby. Just a warning, some taxi drivers didn't know where Viladecans was - we had one refuse to take us there. The other two used a GPS or got directions from other drivers to get us there! Overall, probably a good place to stay if you are on a tight budget or have a car, but it is out of the way and we probably spent the same as a hotel in the centre of town because we had to get taxis a few times to get back there.

HotelInfo.Name: Etap Barcelona Viladecans
HotelInfo.Address: Carretera de Barcelona, 82, 08840 Barcelona, Spain
